pageTitle: Critical choices: Why health care reform is so hard
shareTitle: Critical Choices: Why health care reform is so hard
shareText: As the future of health coverage in the United States remains up the air, we asked North Texans about their experiences with the Affordable Care Act — whom it helped, where it fell short, and what it cost.
tweetText: %23CriticalChoices: Texans share Affordable Care Act stories — whom it helped, where it fell short, and what it cost
